name: Pipe Adapters
description: The Pipe adapters (Top adapters) is used for  connecting top most column pipe to the discharge fitting/discharge bend

name: Pump Adapters
description: The Pump adapters (Bottom adapter)is used for connecting submersible pump to the column pipe. All threads are checked with fitment gauges for lOO% accuracy.

name: Reducers
description: Reducers are designed with ACME thread to ensure proper gripping & there is no chance of column slippage during installation & removal of pumps.

name: Foot Valve
description: Foot Valve is designed with the latest technology incorporating a double guide support for plunger & O-ring is precision fitted to the poppet for a positive seal into the tapered (33˚) self-cleaning valve.

name: Expanders
description: Expanders are designed to expand the pump discharge connecting the BSP Threaded side to the pump 6 ACME Threaded side to the column pipe.

name: Rope Collar
description: Rope Collar issued to secure the pump by connect- inq ropes at both ends of the Rope Collar. 'EAGLE´ Rope Collar is a single mould casted component, without any weld joints.

name: Cast Iron Adapters
description: Cast Iron Adapters are suitable for low-depth borewells, the outer surface is finished with powder coating for atmospheric protection.

name: Jet Assembly
description: Jet Assembly increases the compressor pump´s water flow continuity and to minimize the water pipes scaling.

name: Ferrule FC/NRV
description: FCV/NRV (Flow control & Non-Return Valve) is used to stop the reverse flow of water in FHTC (Functional household tap connection) & to prevent water theft. 'EAGLE´ FCV/NRV is certified by FCRI (Fluid Control Research Institute).
